entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
